tool.help:
.. class:: infomark
========================== Compute abundance index ==========================
This tool is an implementation of the abundance_index function from `RegionalGAM package: <https://github.com/RetoSchmucki/regionalGAM/>`_.
This function compute the Abundance Index across sites and years from your dataset and the regional flight curve.
